message: This is my first offer, Bob. I hope it's fair. Let's get this done quickly!
Let's split it 50/50, Alice. It's a fair start.
I'm willing to compromise, Bob. This offer is still more favorable to me, but I'm showing a good faith effort to reach an agreement.
Alice, I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I still think I deserve a bigger share. This is my best offer so far.
